thread.title_full: Chris Stapleton is Bringing His Mystic to Colorado | Shawn Patrick | Y96.9

title: Chris Stapleton is Bringing His Mystic to Colorado | Shawn Patrick | Y96.9
text:
Chris Stapleton is Bringing His Mystic to Colorado posted by Shawn Patrick - 
This summer's concert outlook is beyond amazing around Colorado, so it's hard to imagine it getting much better... But it just did thanks to the man, the myth, the legend, Chris Stapleton. 
Today Stapleton announced a brand-spanking new tour, including his first headlining show at Red Rocks Amphitheatre. 
Stapleton’s All-American Road Show Tour will come to our state on May 23. Tickets go on sale Feb. 24 at 10 a.m. A pre-sale will go live to Citi card members on Feb. 21 at 10 a.m. 
Count me in! I am a pretty simple guy. I like all the things a normal younger guy likes… Beer, girls, good music, and having a good time. I also really like getting to do what I love, being on the radio! I grew up in Northern Colorado, and it’s honestly a dream come true to get to entertain my friends and family, while making new ones along the way, right in my backyard!
